description: Accepts the resource grouping recommendations suggested by Resilience Hub for your application.

parameters.name: appArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

parameters.name: entries
parameters.description: List of resource grouping recommendations you want to include in your application. (dict) --- Indicates the grouping recommendation you have accepted to include in your application. Indicates the identifier of the grouping recommendation.

nested_params.name: groupingRecommendationId
nested_params.description: Indicates the identifier of the grouping recommendation.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: failedEntries
nested_items.description: List of resource grouping recommendations that could not be included in your application.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: Indicates the error that occurred while implementing a grouping recommendation.

nested_items.name: groupingRecommendationId
nested_items.description: Indicates the identifier of the grouping recommendation.
